name: Traveler's Handy Sword
description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

passiveDescription.0: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1%</cryo> HP.
passiveDescription.1: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1.25%</cryo> HP.
passiveDescription.2: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1.5%</cryo> HP.
passiveDescription.3: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>1.75%</cryo> HP.
passiveDescription.4: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <cryo>2%</cryo> HP.
